text: The 2011–12 UEFA Champions League was the 57th UEFA Champions League. The champions were Chelsea. No third place match was played, as usual, but the teams defeated in the semi-finals were Real Madrid and FC Barcelona. FC Barcelona was the defending champions, but they were eliminated in the semi finals. FC Bayern Munich defeated Real Madrid 3-3 (penalties) in aggregate. FC Barcelona were defeated by Chelsea 3-2 in aggregate. Chelsea defeated FC Bayern Munich 1-1 (4-3 with penalties). ==Knockout stage== ===Round of 16=== |} ===Quarter-finals=== |} ===Semi-finals=== |} ===Final=== ==Statistics== ===Hat-tricks=== Player For Against Result Date Mario Gómez Bayern Munich Napoli 3-2 (H) 2 November 2011 Roberto Soldado Valencia Genk 7-0 (H) 23 November 2011 Lionel Messi Barcelona Viktoria Plzeň 4-0 (A) 23 November 2011 Bafétimbi Gomis4 Lyon Dinamo Zagreb 7-1 (A) 7 December 2011 Lionel Messi5 Barcelona Bayer Leverkusen 7-1 (H) 7 March 2012 Mario Gómez4 Bayern Munich Basel 7-0 (H) 13 March 2012 4Player scored four goals. 5Player scored five goals. title: 2011–12 UEFA Champions League
